title: Covid-19 Cluster: 37 more tested positive
content: 37 more persons tested positive for Covid-19, confirmed the Department of Government Information.Among them, 36 are associates of Peliyagoda Covid-19 Cluster and 01 are prisoners. The total of 137 cases reported today (05) so far.The total number of confirmed cases rises to 88 684 from Covid-19 Clusters.
